Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: calendarView(_:didSelectDate:inCalendar:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Tells the delegate that the calendar view selected a new date in the specified calendar.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: calendar(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the calendar for the calendar view.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: weekdayLabelFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the font for the calendar view’s weekday labels.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: weekdayLabelTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the text color for the calendar view’s weekday labels.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDatesEnabled(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate if the calendar view should enable past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the unselected font for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateEnabledTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the enabled text color for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateDisabledTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the disabled text color for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateSelectedFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected font for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateSelectedTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected text color for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: pastDateSelectedBackgroundColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected background color for past dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: currentDateFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the unselected font for the current date.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: currentDateTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the unselected text color for the current date.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: currentDateSelectedFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected font for the current date.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: currentDateSelectedTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected text color for the current date.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: currentDateSelectedBackgroundColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected background color for the current date.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: futureDateFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the unselected font for future dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: futureDateTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the unselected text color for future dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: futureDateSelectedFont(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected font for future dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.name: futureDateSelectedTextColor(calendarView:)
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected text color for future dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Asks the delegate to provide the selected background color for future dates.

Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html.name: GCCalendarViewDelegate
Protocols/GCCalendarViewDelegate.html.abstract: The delegate of a GCCalendarView object must adopt the GCCalendarViewDelegate protocol. The protocol’s optional methods allow the delegate to handle date selection and customize the calendar view’s appearance.

Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html#/s:10GC.name: week
Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html#/s:10GC.abstract: The calendar is displayed one week at a time.

Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html#/s:10GC.name: month
Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html#/s:10GC.abstract: The calendar is displayed one month at a time.

Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html.name: GCCalendarDisplayMode
Enums/GCCalendarDisplayMode.html.abstract: The display mode when displaying a calendar.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.name: delegate
Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the calendar view.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.name: displayMode
Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.abstract: The display mode for the calendar view.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/c:@M@GCCale.name: init(frame:)
Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/c:@M@GCCale.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated calendar view object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/c:@M@GCCale.name: init()
Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/c:@M@GCCale.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated calendar view object.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.name: today()
Classes/GCCalendarView.html#/s:10GCCalen.abstract: Tells the calendar view to select the current date, updating any visible week views or month views if necessary.

Classes/GCCalendarView.html.name: GCCalendarView
Classes/GCCalendarView.html.abstract: The GCCalendarView class defines a view containing an interactive calendar.
